snippet: The author of more than a dozen novels, as well as short stories, essays and criticism, Ms. Brooke-Rose was one of relatively few Britons to maintain a long association with experimental fiction.
abstract: Christine Brooke-Rose, an inventive English experimental fiction writer who authored more than a dozen novels, dies at age 89.
lead_paragraph: The author of more than a dozen novels, as well as short stories, essays and criticism, Ms. Brooke-Rose was one of relatively few Britons to maintain a long association with experimental fiction.

headline.seo: Christine Brooke-Rose, Experimental Writer, Dies at 89
headline.main: Christine Brooke-Rose, Inventive Writer, Dies at 89
